author: mrmitch
title: Who dosen't love Mickey?
review: Got this set for two reasons, first my kids love anything Disney, and second because I knew these sets with the Disney figures wouldn't last long and I like Mickey Mouse. Set is almost Duplo in nature very few pieces and easy to build. I do like the ladder on the firetruck and the mini figure(Mickey is about 2" tall). Fun set glad I own it.

author: Rgijaba
title: who doesnt love micky?!? more like: WHO loves Micky!
review: i got htis when i was 4, and didnt like it... the Micky mouse minifig is weird and stupid looking, and the only plus is the light up engine, and, after it breaks, makes a REALY anying "eek!" like noise , and theres also no where for micky to sit in the truck, and the whole idea doesnt make sence to me... the ladder is also a fairly good part,  as is the blue 4x4 round part, theres also a odd door piece, that looks out of place, and you realy shouldnt waste your munny on this WORTHLESS set, unless your obsessed with micky mouse, or are a 2 year old...

author: Alemas
title: I was surprised when I found this...
review:
I never knew I had this. It came as a shock that I had something like this! Anyway, this set is for little kids, the wheels have a metal axle and doesn't go on smooth surfaces, Mickey is strange, and the door is... hang on, it's a WINDOW! It looks like a door! At least it has rare pieces: well, almost everything is rare!

Pros:

Rare pieces
Ladder
Trans-blue 2x2 round brick

Cons:

Metal axle
Can't go on smooth surfaces
Strange Mickey
Window that looks like a door
Strange design

Overall, it's not a great set.

author: Squidtron
title: Bulkey, but mikey is nice
review:
This set doesn't have much so I'm just gonna skip to the Cool/Not cool things about this set.
Includes Mikey(+2)
The hose is cool(+1)
Includes a lot of bulky and usles pieces(-2)
Hatchet is cool(+1)

This set gets a... 2/5 Below Average
Don't get this set unless you are desperate to get mikey.

author: modena
title: Look at those parts!
review:
I got this set when I was very little. I never really got to build it, but I still have the parts!

Pros

  • Great parts!
  • Rotating ladder!
  • Cute little replica of Mickey!
  • Contains a simple-to-use fire pump (on the truck)!

Cons

  • Mickeys legs are stuck together

Overall:

This set wasn't totally bad. I don't remember the main model, but the parts were great. I really got the most out of the rotating white brick. The ladder holder did break, but it still fits in. The set gives you this neat transparent blue element, which is great for an ambulance. You also get a printed car front, and a window.

The only con is that Mickey's legs are all in one chunk, so that you can't move him so easily.

Overall, this set wasn't that bad, and if you don't build it, you will find use of the parts!
